name: miya
description: Miya agent-team orchestration plugin for OpenCode

scripts.test: npm run test:core && npm run test:ui
scripts.test:core: npm run typecheck && npm exec vitest run src/ultrawork/scheduler.test.ts src/autoflow/engine.test.ts src/autoflow/persistent.test.ts src/router/runtime.test.ts src/router/index.test.ts src/learning/skill-drafts.test.ts src/ralph/loop.test.ts src/autopilot/executor.test.ts src/tools/router.test.ts src/tools/ralph.test.ts src/gateway/milestone-acceptance.test.ts
scripts.check:ci: npm run check:contracts && npm run doc:lint && biome lint .
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
